channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: Bollywood actor Saiyami Kher, who has always been inclined t
item.description: Bollywood actor Saiyami Kher, who has always been inclined towards sports and fitness, is gearing up to take on the Ironman 70.3 Erkner, a rough and tough triathlon in Berlin in September 2024. In this candid Health Shots interview, Saiyami Kher opens up about how the reason why she took on the grueling fitness event is to challenge herself mentally. Watch the video to know more about Saiyami's training regime, diet tips and why the triathlon matters!

item.title: #MeghanMarkle may be in a difficult situation as her new #li
item.description: #MeghanMarkle may be in a difficult situation as her new #lifestyle brand American #RivieraOrchard is “struggling to find a #CEO”.

item.title: #Kerala has birthed, in what is shaping up to be, it's very
item.description: #Kerala has birthed, in what is shaping up to be, it's very own #MeToo wave (the #hemacommitteereport)— and it feels like it's here to stay
